name: Connie Inukai
offering: Accent Reduction, Book Editing and Layout, Business Coaching, Content Creation, PR (Public Relations), Public Relations, Speaking Opportunities
what_you_do: Connie Inukai is a TEDx speaker, author, inventor, and founder of Write Your Selfie, helping retirees and Baby Boomers realize their passions and document their life stories.
who_you_serve: She serves retirees, Baby Boomers, and seniors, guiding them in entrepreneurship and personal storytelling.
signature_programs: Write Your Selfie, How I Got My Product on QVC, The Today Show, The View, and More…in Retirement
bio: TEDx Speaker, inventor of Tip ‘n Split®, author with features on QVC and major media outlets, 4,153 connections on LinkedIn.
business_focus: Connie Inukai is a TEDx speaker, author, inventor, and founder of Write Your Selfie, helping retirees and Baby Boomers realize their passions and document their life stories. (retirement coaching)
